NC February 2017 to July 2019 Installation of oracle software configuration and creation of 10g 11g and 12c databases in production DEV and TEST environments to supporting the SDLC Designed and physical logical snapshot and active standby databases Allocating system storage and plan future storage requirements Involve in 247 oncall support for production and development databases Created and managed user accounts appropriate roles and privileges to users Worked on 12c multitenant architecture and its new features Refreshingcloning migration of Dev Test and production databases Database maintenance backups recovery patching upgrades and performance tuning Installed monitored and troubleshoot unidirectional and bidirectional Goldengate Created Oracle Wallets and implemented Tablespace level TDE security network encryption Data redaction and Masking Successfully installed Oracle Real Application Cluster RAC including Grid infrastructure and Oracle RDBMS software on a 3 nodes RAC architecture in development and UAT Regularly monitored the alert logs redo log status listener Log and checking the space for normal segments rollback segments and tablespaces Monitoring and optimizing the performance of the database through Database Tuning Application tuning Instance tuning and Tuning Disk Usage Planned and designed database backups strategies for full recoverability Successfully responded to and completed all help desk tickets and work request tickets promptly Oracle Database Administrator State Farm Phoenix AZ January 2013 to January 2017 Installation configuration and maintenance of Oracle 10g 11g and 12c databases Extensively worked in various areas of Data guard ie Installation Recovery RTA Real Time Apply Patching Tuning Switchover Switchback and Failover Performed Logical backup of critical application databases using EXPDPIMPDP with scheduled jobs Cron Job Responsible for creating recovery catalogs and registering databases with Catalog Database Involved in Defragmenting data blocks of table spaces for optimized performance Configured Oracle Streams on Oracle 11g 10g databases for data replication Implemented policies on data confidentiality integrity availability and auditability based on Access controls for Access to Data at the database level Performed SQL and PLSQL tuning and monitored production database using Automatic Workload Repository AWR Automatic Database Diagnostic Monitor ADDM and Automatic Session History ASH Efficiently performed installation setup and creation of 3 node cluster RAC with Oracle experience in GOLDENGATE Installed configured and monitored Unidirectional and bidirectional Golden Gate for replication Performed initial load and change synchronization both for classic and integrated capture Four 4 years of experience in PATCHING Applied both PSU CPU patches Patched both single instances Data Guard and RAC environments MIGRATION and UPGRADE Upgraded both single instance and RAC databases from 10g to 12c and migrated data within and across platforms Migrated from file system to ASM Six years 6 of excellent experience in BACKUP and RECOVERY Design and implemented user managed logical and RMAN Backup strategies Tuned and scheduled backups using DBMS_SCHEDULERcrontab and created recovery catalogs Recovered from loss of both critical noncritical datafiles and entire database Worked with TSPITR and Flashback technologies Three years 3 of experience in RAC Installed and maintained 3 node RAC cluster for large production system and migrated from NonRAC environment to RAC Six 6 years of experience in PERFORMANCE TUNNING Troubleshooting and Tuning Oracle Database applications operating system and network using AWR ASH ADDM EXPLAIN PLAN TKPROF STATSPACK SQLTRACE 11gOEM tuning advisors Created and used AWR baselines for analysis Created and managed user profiles implemented auditing and advanced security measures for protecting data at rest and in motion Installation creation administration and maintenance of Oracle10g 11g and 12c databases Three 3 years of experience in Oracle database 12C Created and setup oracle 12c container and pluggable databases Customized various Unix Shell Scripts Experience providing 247 database support on OLTP and OLAP databases Exposure on Exadata machine to optimize system performance Experience on MS SQL Server PostgreSQL NoSQL Experience in Oracle Support processes for technical requests
